Meta.title: Park Cellars - Your local park wine!
Meta.description: Wines made to be drunk with friends in a park!

Accordion.title: Care
Accordion.text: This is a limited edition production run. Printing starts when the drop ends.

Accordion.title: Detail
Accordion.text: This is a limited edition production run. Printing starts when the drop ends. Reminder: Bad Boys For Life. Shipping may take 10+ days due to COVID-19.

Accordion.title: Shipping
Accordion.text: This is a limited edition production run. Printing starts when the drop ends. Reminder: Bad Boys For Life. Shipping may take 10+ days due to COVID-19.

Description.text: The walnut wood card tray is precision milled to perfectly fit a stack of Focus cards. The powder coated steel divider separates active cards from new ones, or can be used to archive important task lists.

Features.name: Material
Features.description: Solid walnut base with rare earth magnets and powder coated steel card cover

Features.name: Finish
Features.description: Hand sanded and finished with natural oil

Features.name: Includes
Features.description: Wood card tray and 3 refill packs

Features.name: Considerations
Features.description: Made from natural materials. Grain and color vary with each item.

Notice.text: Makes 20 cups of cold brew / 30 servings of Elixir
